item.title: Junior Java developer в Luxoft, Днепропетровск

· Базовые навыки программирования (желателен опыт с Java, С++, С#)

Предлагаем

· Тренинги для личностного роста

· Стажировка в реальных проектах

О проекте

Как попасть на стажировку?

Иван Шмелев

item.title: Senior Android Developer в 500px, Inc.
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

Senior Android Developers at 500px create native applications to showcase the world’s best photographs.

Role responsibilities:

Conceptualize and build 500px mobile products
Work closely with designers and engineers to implement new features that use the latest technologies for Android
Discover and implement innovative ways to increase and maintain speed and quality of Android app

Ideal candidates will have:

Expert knowledge of Java and the Android SDK
Knowledge of other Mobile SDKs, Ruby and/or Javascript is a plus
Previously published mobile applications (please provide links)
Contribution to open source projects (please provide links)
A love of photography

Our interview process is straight forward:

phone interview where you will be asked to write simple programs using collabedit.com
in-person interview at our office where you will have a chance to present stuff you worked on in the past and show your awesome programming skills
[optional] meeting founders of 500px
you are presented with an offer

О проекте

500px Kyiv office start-up. You will have a chance to become first employee of 500px in Kyiv.

You will have the opportunity to work with one of the brightest and hardest working startup teams in the tech industry. We take pride in the product we ship and love what we do. By joining 500px you will see the immediate impact of your work and contribute to inspiring the world with the world’s best photo sharing.

Откликнуться на вакансию

item.title: Senior Java/Scala Developer в Sigma Ukraine, Харьков, Одесса
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

At least 5 years of software engineering experience
At least 2 years of experience with Java and/or Scala
At least 1-2 years of experience with Hadoop
Understanding of Linux, Bash-Scripting
Understanding of XML/XSD processes
Networking, including HTTP/HTTPS
Experience with MapReduce approach
Database skills (SQL)
At least upper-intermediate level of English

Будет плюсом

Hadoop 4.2 (Cloudera edition) based on new YARN interface
Apache Oozie Workflow engine
Apache HBase
Apache Hive
Apache Pig
Circonus SaaS service

Обязанности

Work with team members, product management, and QA to develop data driven applications
Develop and maintain Scala and Java applications using technologies such as Hadoop, MRv2(YARN) APIs, services and Akka
Participate in data schema design with a focus on HBase, Hive, and Cloudera Impala tools
Produce unit and integration tests for Data Pipeline applications
Assist operations team in specification and deployment of cluster hardware and software
Participate in code reviews
Ensure test suite quality
Debug distributed application issues

О проекте

We are looking for a Senior Java/Scala Developer for an exciting new project in the area of Big Data. Our client, Collective Media, one of the leading U.S. tech companies in the area of video advertising, is setting up an outsourcing team who would be an integral part of their U.S.-based Java engineering team.

Project:
Collective Media provides data-driven, multi-screen, multi-format digital advertising solutions for brand advertisers. Its big data expertise allows brands and their agencies to customize ads in real-time based on screen and format and target audiences based on consumer profile, location and context data. As a developer working with Collective’s Data Application team, you will be responsible for the design, implementation, and deployment of applications that make use of big data infrastructure. Collective’s technology stack serves 10s of billions of impressions monthly, receives hundreds of thousands of HTTP requests per second, processes hundreds of gigabytes of data per hour and makes hundreds of billions of predictions about user behavior each day.

Откликнуться на вакансию

item.title: Senior JavaScript Developer for Playtech Mobile в Ciklum, Киев
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

Required qualifications:
— Excellent knowledge of web technologies in general — JS, HTML, CSS
— 2+ years of experience working with JavaScript, AJAX
— 2+ years of experience working with CSS3, XHTML (knowledge of LESS is a plus)
— Experience of working with jQuery
— Experience of cross-browser projects development
— Understanding of the principles of the OOP
— Strong team player with good communication skills
— Ability to maintain good quality of work tasks
— Ability to learn quickly and desire to improve
— Good knowledge of English language — spoken and written

Будет плюсом

Good to have skills:
— Experience of working with Backbone.js, Require.js, Socket.io
— Version controlling (SVN,GIT)
— System integration experience (WebServices, SOA)
— Initiative, goal and results orientated

Предлагаем

Ciklum offers you:
• Variety of knowledge sharing and training opportunities
• A lot of various technical seminars
• Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
• Competitive salary
• Career and professional growth
• Possibility to work in a big and successful company
• Long-term employment with 20 working-days paid vacation and other social benefits
• State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions

Обязанности

Responsibilities:
— Analyze business requirements
— Make architectural and design decisions (using JS, HTML, CSS, XHTML)
— Write robust manageable code
— Alpha testing and code review
— Support and promote the OOP approach
— Become a mentor and a self-motivated and result focused team player

О проекте

Ciklum is a Danish innovative IT outsourcing company specializing in nearshore software development in Ukraine.
Established in 2002, Ciklum employs more than 2000+ IT-specialists worldwide with more than 170+ current clients own development teams. Ciklum has pioneered a unique business model in Ukraine where employees have direct communication with the client and are equal to clients` home-based colleagues Developers directly communicate with European colleagues, directly affecting the product and business customers
Ciklum has development offices in six cities of Ukraine (Kyiv, Kharkiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Odesa, Donetsk, Vinnytsia), Belarus (Minsk) and Pakistan (Lahore and Islamabad), as well as representative offices in Denmark, Sweden, United Kingdom, Switzerland, Germany and the Netherlands.
We believe that professional and personal growth is essential, so we create an atmosphere in which a man easily achieves his potential. We support any initiative, aimed at sharing knowledge and development. We have more than 10 self-driven Practice Leaders Groups (. NET, QA, Management & Communication, Mobile Technologies, etc.). Therefore, every employee can easily find colleagues with similar interests

On behalf of Playtech (www.playtech.com) Ciklum is looking for a Senior JavaScript Developer for Playtech Mobile team.

Playtech — the world’s leading online gaming platform vendor — is inviting experienced JS developers to join the new development center in Kiev. Become part of the Playtech Mobile team to develop HTML5 Client games using the latest mobile technologies. HTML5 client application developed from the scratch using bleeding-edge technologies: HTML5, WebServices, CSS3, JS, AJAX, XHTML and others. Project goal is to provide PlayTech licensees with a way to address rapidly growing market of mobile devices: tablets (both iPads and Android based). The application will involve very intensive UI development from one side and highly scalable server-side implementation from the other. The project requirements are very demanding both from the usability and technological points of view.

About team:
Thus all the team members will take active part in the solution design and implementation. The project is tightly integrated with development teams which are spread in three locations: Ukraine, Estonia and Israel. Our team is responsible for developing web based casino applications for Mobile Devices. You have a chance to become a part of our friendly professional team. Our team will provide support and knowledge sharing to make your integration into our team as smooth as possible.

Join Ciklum and “Cross the Borders” together with us!

If you are interested — please send your CV on hr@ciklum.com

Откликнуться на вакансию

item.title: Java developer (Middle level) в X1 Group, Харьков
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

* Отлично знать Java, стандартную библиотеку и Servlet API;
* Понимать принципы работы JVM и альтернативных языков для этой платформы (Scala, Jython etc);
* Знать принципы функционального программирования;
* Понимать, что такое параллельные и конкурентные, асинхронные и неблокирующие вычисления, и чем они отличаются;
* Хорошо знать SQL и реляционные базы данных, осознавать преимущества и недостатки ORM (Hibernate, JPA). Иметь представление о том, чем отличаются реляционные базы данных от документо-ориентированных и key-value БД;
* Иметь опыт создания веб-сервисов и взаимодействия с ними, осознание разницы между REST и SOAP
* Уметь писать модульные тесты, а также уметь писать такой код, на который хорошо пишутся модульные тесты;
* Знать английский на уровне общения с англоязычными клиентами письменно и устно.

Предлагаем

* Динамичный, технически интересный и развивающий Вас как специалиста проект;
* Достойную компенсацию вложенного труда и возможность профессионального роста;
* Возможность работать в команде крутых специалистов;
* Командировки в Германию.

Обязанности

* Писать новые и кастомизировать старые фичи, используя язык Scala;
* Разрабатывать интерфейсы взаимодействия с множеством внутренних и внешних приложений;
* Выявлять плохие технические решения и менять их на хорошие технические решения;
* Участвовать в обсуждении и проектировании архитектуры и выборе технологий.

О проекте

Вы будете заниматься разработкой распределённого веб-приложения для успешного немецкого стартапа. Наш продукт предоставляет пользователям возможность быстро и 100% онлайн оформить микро-кредит. Услугами стартапа уже пользуется несколько сотен тысяч человек по всему миру. Сейчас мы находимся на стадии интенсивного роста, количество пользователей и новых задач постоянно увеличивается, и нам нужен крутой профессионал в команду, который поможет проекту быстро и качественно реагировать на изменяющиеся требования рынка и бизнеса.

Откликнуться на вакансию

Ciklum is a Danish innovative IT outsourcing company specializing in nearshore software development in Ukraine.www.ciklum.com

Currently we are looking for a Senior Android Developer to join our PO team.

About project:

Project Office (PO) — Mobile Delivery Unit.
Being a team player of Mobile Delivery Unit you will have an opportunity to work on a variety of projects, have a communication with distributed team members and their clients.

Main responsibilities:

• Following full cycle project delivery cycle: analyzing the requirements, clarifying the requirements with the client, estimating the project and risks with the team, participating in development tasks.

General:
• Good knowledge of Java and Android API — 3-4 years (critical skills).
• Ability to write high quality code quickly and work within a wide variety of codebases.

• Good knowledge of writing efficient code in constrained environments.
• Previous experience of Agile scrum development is required.
• Previous experience of Test Driven Development, XP or Pair Programming is desirable.

Level of English: Intermediate.

Personal skills:
• Responsible, Communicative, Ability to learn, Not being afraid to work extra hours if necessary.
• Ability to relate positively to and engage with a wide range of people.
• Strong self-motivation, reliable and flexible team-player.
• High attention to detail, ability to remain focused under pressure.
• Always seeking to improve processes and suggest alternative better solutions.

Ciklum offers you:

• Variety of knowledge sharing and training opportunities

item.title: Senior Java Developer (Stibo Systems) в Ciklum, Днепропетровск
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

Ciklum is a Danish innovative IT outsourcing company specializing in nearshore software development in Ukraine. www.ciklum.com

Currently we are looking for a Senior Java Developer to join our Stibo Systems team.

About Stibo Systems

Stibo Systems is a world marked leader within the area of strategic information management. Our system enables large organizations to manage strategic information globally. By providing the links between the product, the supplier, and other information related assets by means of an integrated process our STEP platform streamlines the process of collecting, managing, and delegating operational intelligence across the company. The creates a simple, reliable source of strategic information and in this way the knowledge of the single departments become beneficial to the company as a whole, leading to growing profitability, reduced risk, and enlarged flexibility. Our global customers include Sony, GE, Siemens, Target, and Kellogg’s. Stibo Systems has 300 employees in total, approximately 100 of these in the main seat in Denmark. We are part of the Stibo A/S group, with a head count of 800 employees worldwide. Please also see www.stibosystems.com.

About you

Stibo Systems is a very successful international company being a worldwide market leader within the area of strategic information management. The company develops enterprise software for Master Data Management. Due to a growing number of customers and a serious strategy focusing on growth Stibo Systems is currently hiring new employees.
Your assignment will be, together with the remaining team of software developers and QA engineers, to further develop the core part of our very advanced Master Data Management (MDM) solution, which is founded in a JEE architecture. Today this solution is being used with great success by some of the world’s largest companies.
Beside a solid experience working with Java development (5+ years), it is important that your profile is matching the following criteria:
• Knowledge on browser based application development (GWT, CSS)
• Knowledge on SQL and RDBMS (Oracle)
• Experience with XML, XSLT, and JSON
• Some experience with server based architecture (parallelism, performance, scalability, security)
• Like the agile approach to software development
You are graduated Master of Computer Science. You have a flexible and proactive attitude and are able to work analytically even with tasks that are not very well defined from the beginning. You have the drive, want to get things done, and you are able to communicate in a constructive manner clarifying your knowledge to your colleagues in the team, and at the same time you have the courage to insist where you know you’re right.
You are going to become a part of the R&D department, which are using the principles of SCRUM quite intensively. Here you will be part of a team consisting of 3-4 experienced developer and 1 QA engineer. Typically you will be involved in 2 big releases every year. Your will learn about a very large domain where you can be sure to continuously develop for many years.

What Stibo offers

You will meet an environment with rich opportunities for constantly adding new professional skills and where much focus will be on you and your carrier. You will get a broad range of competences with the area of the core product of Stibo and you will also get the opportunity to specialize within certain aspects of the solution where you will play a central role with respect to future development. Stibo is a company where the well-being and professional development of each employee is vital and you will due to your performance be able to directly influence your career. Stibo offer attractive employment and benefits plus and extraordinary environment with dedicated colleagues in an informal culture open to take on board the ideas of the employees. In the long run posting will be possible.

Ciklum offers you:

• Variety of knowledge sharing and training opportunities
• A lot of various technical seminars
• Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
• Competitive salary
• Career and professional growth
• Possibility to work in a big and successful company
• Long-term employment with 20 working-days paid vacation and other social benefits
• State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions

Join Ciklum and “Cross the Borders” together with us!

If you are interested — please send your CV to Yana Zhmura, yzhm@ciklum.com, M: +380 67 964 68 57, Skype: yana.zhmura

item.title: Java Backend Engineer (LoopMe) в Ciklum, Днепропетровск
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

Ciklum is a Danish innovative IT outsourcing company specializing in nearshore software development in Ukraine. www.ciklum.com

Currently we are looking for a Java Backend Engineer to join our LoopMe team.

Role

We are looking for ambitious backend engineers to create a global leading mobile advertising platform. You will be working on our audience segmentation platform, which manages interaction history profiles of 100M users.
Our backend platform team is a small highly talented collaborative group with number of interesting technical challenges. Your responsibilities will depend on your years of experience and accomplishments.
The ideal candidates can adapt fast to changing environments and proactively identify future product performance issues and change code to ensure continuous high system performance.

About LoopMe

LoopMe was founded to solve the problem of making in-app advertising less intrusive, more enjoyable, valuable and relevant for mobile consumers. At the right time and place, great advertising and offers can be great content. LoopMe enables the social community to help people find great ads.
We put the consumers first, allowing them to be in control of their own advertising preferences and experiences. We value feedback and engagement from customers about good and bad experiences.
Our ambition is to build a highly effective, worldwide mobile advertising solution that will become market leader in social advertising in 3 years time. Our people are our most important assets to accomplish our goals, and we are on a mission to build a great company. We hire the very best talent, provide opportunities for professional and personal growth, and make them invaluable problem solvers and drivers in every aspect of our business.
Our head office is located in London, UK and development office in Dnepropetrovsk, Ukraine.

Main product

Using the company founder’s 20+ years of experience in digital and mobile advertising industry, LoopMe has developed a state-of-the-art social preference ad platform to deliver billions of advertisements and offers to consumers worldwide on a daily basis.
The core platform delivers advertisement to mobile devices and contains a user segmentation database used for retargeting advertisements. The platform is accessible to users worldwide via a self-serve tool.
Today, the platform is integrated with big mobile game developer studios like Halfbrick (Fruit Ninja) and Outfit7 (Talking Tom), it delivers 100M ads per months and generates over $1M in ad revenue each year. The goal is to create a worldwide platform to manage 10B ads per month, and generate $100M in ad revenue each year.

Software Development Process

We follow an Agile development process to deliver high quality software, which involves regular product demos to senior managers in LoopMe company worldwide.
The following tools are used in our development process:
• Pivotal for bug tracking and development task tracking
• Confluence for team documentation and product feature descriptions
• Skype, Google Hangout and Join.me for team communication and product demos
• Selenium for automating end to end product testing
• GIT and GITHub

Key responsibilities

• Develop and design features for our in-house developed audience segmentation platform
• Maintain code quality
• Performance optimization
• Pair code reviews
• Research new technologies and software solutions for our business problems

Key skills & experience

• 3+ years working experience with Java
• 6 months+ working experience with Clojure
• 2+ years of experience with PostgreSQL or other RDBMS
• Experience with nGINX configuration and tuning (or other web / proxy servers)
• Experience large scale distributed server systems
• Previous experience in working in Agile product team
• Working knowledge of data structures, algorithms and basic complexity analysis
• Ability to write efficient, elegant, efficient and maintainable code in a time constrained environment.
• Self-starter, able to tackle projects from start to finish without a lot of hand-holding
• Highly developed problem-solving and debugging skills

Bonus qualifications

• Open source contributor
• Knowledge of HTML5/CSS3 and JavaScript

Education

• B.S., M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science or equivalent

About you

• You love mobile
• Good sense of humor
• Want to be part of a high growth startup company with global ambitions
• Proactive attitude towards improving processes and finding new solutions to challenging business problems
• Strong self-motivation, reliable and flexible team-player
• High attention to detail, ability to remain focused under pressure.

Benefits

• Competitive compensation package
• Hundreds of millions of people see your work and use our products worldwide
• A transparent work environment
• Working in a team that inspires, and works with you to achieve industry changing goals

Ciklum offers you:

• Variety of knowledge sharing and training opportunities
• A lot of various technical seminars
• Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
• Competitive salary
• Career and professional growth
• Possibility to work in a big and successful company
• Long-term employment with 20 working-days paid vacation and other social benefits
• State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions

Join Ciklum and “Cross the Borders” together with us!

If you are interested — please send your CV to Yana Zhmura, yzhm@ciklum.com, M: +380 67 964 68 57, Skype: yana.zhmura

• Desired: Vaadin, Spring, Hibernate;
• English: at least Intermediate, high communication skills would be best case;

Opportunities:

About project
LoopMe was founded to solve the problem of making in-app advertising less intrusive, more enjoyable, valuable and relevant for mobile consumers. At the right time and place, great advertising and offers can be great content. LoopMe enables the social community to help people find great ads.
Their ambition is to build a highly effective, worldwide mobile advertising solution that will become market leader in social advertising in 3 years’ time. Their people are their most important assets to accomplish their goals, and they are on a mission to build a great company. LoopMe has developed a state-of-the-art social preference ad platform that delivers advertisement to mobile devices and contains a user segmentation database used for retargeting advertisements. The platform is accessible to users worldwide via a self-serve tool.
Today, the platform is integrated with big mobile game developer studios like Halfbrick (Fruit Ninja) and Outfit7 (Talking Tom), it delivers 100M ads per months and generates over $1M in ad revenue each year. The goal is to create a worldwide platform to manage 10B ads per month, and generate $100M in ad revenue each year.

• Variety of knowledge sharing and training opportunities
• A lot of various technical seminars
• Unique working environment where you communicate and work directly with client
• Competitive salary
• Career and professional growth
• Possibility to work in a big and successful company
• Long-term employment with 20 working-days paid vacation and other social benefits
• State of the art, cool, centrally located offices with warm atmosphere which creates really good working conditions

О проекте

Ciklum is a Danish innovative IT outsourcing company specializing in nearshore software development in Ukraine.
Established in 2002, Ciklum employs more than 2000+ IT-specialists worldwide with more than 170+ current clients own development teams. Ciklum has pioneered a unique business model in Ukraine where employees have direct communication with the client and are equal to clients` home-based colleagues Developers directly communicate with European colleagues, directly affecting the product and business customers
Ciklum has development offices in six cities of Ukraine (Kyiv, Kharkiv, Dnipropetrovsk, Odesa, Donetsk, Vinnytsia), Belarus (Minsk) and Pakistan (Lahore and Islamabad), as well as representative offices in Denmark, Sweden, United Kingdom, Switzerland, Germany and the Netherlands.
We believe that professional and personal growth is essential, so we create an atmosphere in which a man easily achieves his potential. We support any initiative, aimed at sharing knowledge and development. We have more than 10 self-driven Practice Leaders Groups (.NET, QA, Management & Communication, Mobile Technologies, etc.). Therefore, every employee can easily find colleagues with similar interests.

Currently we are looking for a Middle Java Developer to join Whatever mobile team.

Whatever mobile (www.whatevermobile.com) is the specialist for the integration of mobile technology into different business processes. We develop individual and innovative solutions for all industries. The highest demand for quality and security makes our offer unique. “Mobile technology” simplifies and flexibilizes business processes and thus enables cost savings, productivity increases, raised security levels, improved customer service and high customer loyalty. Whatever mobile opens us paths of communication and sales for mobile business processes and realizes the technology.

Join Ciklum and “Cross the Borders” together with us!
If you are interested — please send your CV to hr@ciklum.com

item.title: Java Developer в EngagePoint, Киев
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

• J2 SE/EE (3 years +)
• Web-enabled applications development (3 years +)
• OOP/OOD and design patterns (3 years +)
• SQL (2 years +)
• Spoken English of Intermediate level

Related technologies stack:

• EJB3, Web Services (JAX-WS, JAX-RS, CXF), JMS
• JPA/Hibernate, Queries optimization
• JSF2, GWT, Wicket, JS, HTML, CSS
• BIRT Reports, Jasper Reports

Предлагаем

• Variety of new knowledge sharing and training opportunities
• Unique working environment
• Career and professional growth
• Long-term employment
• Ongoing interaction with the USA team
• Paid vacation, sick leave and other social benefits
• High level compensation based on the regular performance reviews
• Various social & team-building activities
• Comfortable office in the center of Kiev (Pecherska metro station)
• Opportunity to travel to the USA as project needs will require
• Relocation Package (L1B visa)

О проекте

EngagePoint™ — is an American healthcare software and IT services company which provides services to cater all phases of software development life cycle, from requirements analysis to the user acceptance, for the federal government of the United States and private sector companies in the healthcare sector of the USA.
EngagePoint™ facts:
- Founded in 2006, headquartered in Florida, with offices in Maryland, Minnesota and North Dakota, Kiev.
- selected as a subcontractor to develop Health Insurance Exchanges for the states of Maryland and Minnesota, USA.
- Ranks № 34 on annual Inc. 500|5000, an exclusive ranking of the US fastest-growing private companies
- Ranks № 2 in the healthcare sector, in which it provides technology solutions and services.
We’re looking for professionals to become the best company for professionals.
To learn more about EngagePoint, please visit our web site at: www.engagepoint.com
